episodes.title: USS Callister
episodes.plot: Capt. Robert Daly presides over his crew with wisdom and courage. But a new recruit will soon discover nothing on this spaceship is what it seems.

episodes.title: Arkangel
episodes.plot: After nearly losing her daughter, a mother invests in a new technology that allows her to keep track of her.

episodes.title: Crocodile
episodes.plot: An insurance agent investigates a minor traffic incident using a device that manifests peoples' memories, but one of her witnesses has something to hide.

episodes.title: Hang the DJ
episodes.plot: Paired up by a dating program that puts an expiration date on all relationships, Frank and Amy soon begin to question the system's logic.

episodes.title: Metalhead
episodes.plot: In the post-apocalyptic landscape of the Scottish Moors, a woman attempts to survive the land full of "dogs."

episodes.title: Black Museum
episodes.plot: A woman enters the Black Museum, where the proprietor tells his stories relating to the artifacts.
